Text: do you still need to replace the eboot and param file before using these or does this make game run?

Hi alithegamer and everyone... I was in the same exact problem like you on CFW 3.55... and solved copy the entire game via FTP to the PS3. Try that...
By The Way... I almost get fucking nuts in the process of discover that little detail.
